titleStmt.title: A warning to the inhabitants of Leeds, and all others in cities, towns and villages, who have willfully been persecuting the people of the Lord whom he hath called by his eternal spirit to magnifie himself in, and to testifie for truth and righteousness, and against all ungodly works, and workers thereof / by Isabel Wails.
titleStmt.author: Wails, Isabel.

titleStmt.title: A warning to the inhabitants of Leeds, and all others in cities, towns and villages, who have willfully been persecuting the people of the Lord whom he hath called by his eternal spirit to magnifie himself in, and to testifie for truth and righteousness, and against all ungodly works, and workers thereof / by Isabel Wails.
